Support us?

Maintaining the volcano and earthquake news sections on this website, the free Volcano Webcams tool Link: https://webcams.volcanodiscovery.com and interactive map widget Link: https://earthquakes.volcanodiscovery.com and is a free-time, both time- and server cost intensive effort.
